target_audience: Adults (20-45), both genders, interested in fashion and value shopping
color_scheme: White background with pops of color from the products (blues, pinks, greens, etc.). Overall bright and cheerful.
composition: Product-focused, showcasing a variety of apparel and footwear items from different brands.
special_elements: Offers (20-70% discount), brand logos, sale duration (22nd September - 02nd October)
